solution_line_template: He picked {num_bushels} bushels of corn and each bushel weighs {bushel_weight} pounds so he picked {num_bushels}*{bushel_weight} = <<{num_bushels}*{bushel_weight}={total_corn_weight}>>{total_corn_weight} pounds of corn

Each ear of corn weighs {ear_weight} pounds and he has {total_corn_weight} pounds of corn so he picked {total_corn_weight}/{ear_weight} = <<{total_corn_weight}/{ear_weight}={num_ears}>>{num_ears} ears of corn
